# housekeeping

* Bugfix for the docs app which prevented content views from rendering. See: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/issues/6760
* `worker.Base`: switched `workerId` from a config to a class field. See: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/issues/6758
* buildScripts/createApp: replace MainContainer with Viewport. See: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/issues/6759
